import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-admin-dashboard', templateUrl: './admin-dashboard.component.html', styleUrls: ['./admin-dashboard.component.css'] }) export class AdminDashboardComponent { } Document

Welcome to Admin Dashboard

Manage users and subjects efficiently with our intuitive dashboard. You can add, view, and edit users, manage subjects, and track attendance records in one place. Stay in control with seamless administration tools.
